review: A solid built unit with excellent processing times, and the pages refresh very fast. High quality images and audio output. I took one star out because the remote don't have a stop button (only play, pause, and fast forward/re-wind). Occasionally I noticed loss of audio from some channels because an earlier app is still running in the background, so I had to refresh/reboot the unit, then it worked. A stop function on the remote might help stop the app from continue to run in the background. A few times the voice function on the remote froze, but removing and putting the battery back on fixed the issue. Would like to see more useful apps added to Fire TV, and a search function similar to Roku 3 that search across other apps, not just amazon prime.
